entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:59 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
